com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy

Interface FunctionDefinition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FunctionDefinitionAccessPermitted, FunctionDefinitionArithmetic, FunctionDefinitionBag, FunctionDefinitionBagIsIn, FunctionDefinitionBagOneAndOnly, FunctionDefinitionBagSize, FunctionDefinitionBase, FunctionDefinitionComparison, FunctionDefinitionDateTimeArithmetic, FunctionDefinitionDecrypt, FunctionDefinitionEquality, FunctionDefinitionHigherOrderBag, FunctionDefinitionHomogeneousSimple, FunctionDefinitionLogical, FunctionDefinitionNumberTypeConversion, FunctionDefinitionRegexpMatch, FunctionDefinitionRFC822NameMatch, FunctionDefinitionSet, FunctionDefinitionStringConversion, FunctionDefinitionStringEqualIgnoreCase, FunctionDefinitionStringFunctions, FunctionDefinitionStringNormalize, FunctionDefinitionTimeInRange, FunctionDefinitionURIStringConcatenate, FunctionDefinitionX500NameMatch, FunctionDefinitionXPath

    public interface FunctionDefinition
    FunctionDefinition is the interface that objects representing XACML functions found in Match and Apply elements in Policies, PolicySets and Rules.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExpressionResult evaluate(EvaluationContext evaluationContext, java.util.List<FunctionArgument> arguments)
      Evaluates this FunctionDefinition on the given List ofFunctionArguments.
      Identifier getDataTypeId()
      Returns the Identifier for the data type returned by this function if returnsBag() is false or if this FunctionDefinition returns a bag containing a single data type.
      Identifier getId()
      Gets the Identifier for this FunctionDefinition.
      boolean returnsBag()
      Determines if this FunctionDefinition returns a bag of values or a single value.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        Identifier getId()
        Gets the Identifier for this FunctionDefinition.
        Returns:
        the Identifier for this FunctionDefinition.

      • getDataTypeId

        Identifier getDataTypeId()
        Returns the Identifier for the data type returned by this function if returnsBag() is false or if this FunctionDefinition returns a bag containing a single data type. Otherwise it returns null.
        Returns:
        the Identifier for the XACML data type this FunctionDefinition returns

      • returnsBag

        boolean returnsBag()
        Determines if this FunctionDefinition returns a bag of values or a single value.
        Returns:
        true if this FunctionDefinition returns a bag, else false

      • evaluate

        ExpressionResult evaluate(EvaluationContext evaluationContext,
                        java.util.List<FunctionArgument> arguments)
        Evaluates this FunctionDefinition on the given List ofFunctionArguments.
        Parameters:
        evaluationContext - the EvaluationContext to use in the evaluation
        arguments - the List of FunctionArguments for the evaluation
        Returns:
        an ExpressionResult with the results of the call
